sec.p: The essential oil of P. tobira seeds was extracted by HD using a Clevenger-type apparatus. Briefly, 50 g of fine powder of P. tobira were immersed in 500 mL of distilled water and extracted during 3 h. The distilled essential oils were separated using hexane, dried over anhydrous sodium sulfate and kept in a dark glass bottle at 4 °C until further analysis.
